translation.zh: 这是种族歧视

translation.en: Are you fucking kidding?
translation.zh: 你他妈在搞笑吗？

translation.en: What do you care? You're Mexican.
translation.zh: 你个墨西哥人介意什么？

translation.en: Hello, Sheik.
translation.zh: 你好 酋长

translation.en: Hello, Sheik, my friend.
translation.zh: 酋长 我的朋友

translation.en: Welcome. On behalf of the great state of New Jersey,
translation.zh: 欢迎 请让我代表整个新泽西州

translation.en: I want to welcome you to New Jersey.
translation.zh: 欢迎您的到来

translation.en: I know that was redundant. I'm sorry. I'm just very nervous.
translation.zh:
我知道这么说有点多余
抱歉啊 我真的很紧张

translation.en: Thank you, thank you.
translation.zh: 感谢您

translation.en: We have a great party planned for you this evening.
translation.zh: 今晚我们有个很盛大的派对

translation.en: What are you talking about, I can't go?
translation.zh: 我不能去？你什么意思？

translation.en: I just did my hair and makeup and everything.
translation.zh: 我才做了发型 化了妆 都准备好了

translation.en: Sheiks are very particular.
translation.zh: 酋长的身份很特殊

translation.en: It's international cultural protocol, you know.
translation.zh:
我们要遵守的可是
国际文化交流的礼仪

translation.en: - You don't know that? - International protocol?
translation.zh:
-你不知道吗？
-国际礼仪？

translation.en: - Yep. - What the fuck are you talking about?
translation.zh:
-对
-你他妈在说些什么？

translation.en: Do not answer that.
translation.zh: 不要接电话

translation.en: - Do not answer that! - Hello?
translation.zh:
-别接！
-喂？

translation.en: Robert Spencer for Irving.
translation.zh: 这是罗伯特史宾斯 我找欧文

translation.en: Robert Spencer? I don't know a Robert Spencer.
translation.zh:
罗伯特史宾斯？
我可不认识什么罗伯特史宾斯

translation.en: - What do you want? - I'm a business associate...
translation.zh:
-你想干什么？
-我是他的商业合伙人

translation.en: - Who is that? Who is that? - I tell you, for God's sake...
translation.zh:
-这是谁？
-我告诉过你

translation.en: - ...I told you not to call here, all right? - What is that about?
translation.zh:
-我和你说过不要打过来
-你什么意思？

translation.en: - Two more federal agents tonight. - What?
translation.zh:
-今晚又加了两名联邦探员
-什么？

translation.en: - No. No way. - Two feds.
translation.zh:
-不行
-两名探员

translation.en: - No. - I need them.
translation.zh:
-不可以
-我需要

translation.en: Bodyguards for the sheik.
translation.zh: 酋长的保安

translation.en: No, no, no, that's too many guys for me to control.
translation.zh: 不行 人太多了会露馅的

translation.en: - No. No. - Irving, remember who's in charge here.
translation.zh:
-不行
-欧文 记得谁才是老大

translation.en: Rosalyn, get off the extension.
translation.zh: 罗丝琳 把电话放下

translation.en: I'm not on it.
translation.zh: 我没有拿电话啊

translation.en: Look, don't call here again, all right?
translation.zh: 记得别再打这个电话了

translation.en: - Don't call at home. - All right. Good night.
translation.zh:
-别给我家打电话
-行吧 晚安

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: If it's a business call, don't interrupt, all right?
translation.zh:
如果下次再有生意的电话
你不要打断我 好吗？

translation.en: Federal agents?
translation.zh: 联邦探员？

translation.en: No, it's bodyguards for the, uh, visiting dignitaries' that's all.
translation.zh: 是给这次这些外宾的保镖

translation.en: What is it, an IRS thing? Like a tax investigation?
translation.zh:
是国税局吗？
打电话来是来查税的吗？

translation.en: Why do you got to say that? I mean, that's why...
translation.zh: 你这么问是什么意思？

translation.en: ...I can't invite you... It's too complicated.
translation.zh: 就是太复杂 所以我才不愿让你去

translation.en: - Are you in trouble? - Look, stop being so nosy.
translation.zh:
-你惹上麻烦了吗？
-别管闲事了

translation.en: - Look at this shit. - Well, I'm only nosy...
translation.zh:
-看看这
-我多管闲事

translation.en: ...'cause you never tell me anything.
translation.zh: 因为你什么都不告诉我

translation.en: Can we clean up this fridge?
translation.zh: 能不能清理一下冰箱？

translation.en: I mean, what are you causing trouble for all the time?
translation.zh: 你为什么总是在惹麻烦？

translation.en: Do not answer that!
translation.zh: 不要接！

translation.en: - Hello? - Hello, it's Carmine.
translation.zh:
-喂？
-喂 我是卡麦

translation.en: Oh, hi, Carmine. We were just talking about you.
translation.zh: 卡麦 你好 我们正聊到你呢

translation.en: Yeah, Irving's being a mean, boring man...
translation.zh: 欧文又恶毒又无趣

translation.en: ...saying that he doesn't want me to come tonight.
translation.zh: 说他今晚不想让我参加

translation.en: - Tell him he's crazy. - Well, I agree.
translation.zh:
-他简直疯了
-我也觉得

translation.en: - Tell him yourself. - It wouldn't be a party without you.
translation.zh:
-你自己说
-没有你 不成派对啊

translation.en: - Can you imagine? - 'Cause you're coming!
translation.zh:
-你说的对
-你一定要来！

translation.en: - Yeah. Tell him yourself. - All right. Hey, Carmie.
translation.zh:
-嗯 你和他说
-喂 卡麦

translation.en: Irving, you're crazy. Your wife is coming.
translation.zh: 欧文 你傻了吗？你媳妇一定要来

translation.en: You kidding me? She's the life of the party.
translation.zh: 开玩笑吗？她简直就是派对女王啊

translation.en: - Everybody loves her. - I'm the life of the party.
translation.zh:
-每个人都爱她
-我是派对女王

translation.en: You know what she's like. She's unpredictable. She's just...
translation.zh: 你见过她的 她有时很难控制

translation.en: Hey, don't talk about me like that!
translation.zh: 不准你这么说我！

translation.en: - What is Carmine saying? - I can't hear what he's saying.
translation.zh:
-卡麦怎么说？
-我听不见他说什么了

translation.en: - Let me listen. - Hey, look, Irving...
translation.zh:
-安静点
-听着 欧文

translation.en: - ...it's very important that she comes, you understand? - Carmine loves me.
translation.zh:
-她一定要来
-卡麦可喜欢我了

translation.en: This is a really big, big night for us, you understand?
translation.zh: 这对我俩来说是个很重要的夜晚

translation.en: Come on, you got to bring your wife.
translation.zh: 拜托 带上你的妻子

translation.en: And Dolly's got something special for her' right?
translation.zh: 今晚多莉还为她准备了特别的礼物

translation.en: - Yeah, I do, I got your nail polish. - See? Listen, listen.
translation.zh:
-对 我帮你买到了护甲油
-听见了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I got your nail polish for you, sweetie!
translation.zh: 我帮你买到了护甲油哦

translation.en: See? Something special for you. What is it? What is it?
translation.zh:
很特别的礼物哦
我听不清你在说什么了

translation.en: Come on. Tell me. What... What...
translation.zh: 拜托 告诉我 什么…

translation.en: What is it? You got a girlfriend coming?
translation.zh: 你说你让你女朋友来？

translation.en: Come on, I thought we were friends.
translation.zh: 我还以为我们是朋友呢

translation.en: You're not gonna tell me you got a girlfriend? This is ridiculous.
translation.zh:
你是想告诉我你还有个女友？
这简直太疯狂了

translation.en: - What is it? - Nah, it's...
translation.zh:
-那你说什么？
-没什么

translation.en: Look, we handle this like men, you understand?
translation.zh: 你可是个堂堂大男人

translation.en: You're bringing your wife. We're gonna have a good time.
translation.zh: 把你老婆带来 今晚会非常有趣的

translation.en: All right, we'll see you there. It'll be fun.
translation.zh: 好的 等会见

translation.en: That's an order from the mayor. Goodbye.
translation.zh: 这可是市长的命令 再见

translation.en: All right, you happy? Go get ready.
translation.zh: 你开心了吗？ 赶紧去换衣服

translation.en: Yes, I am happy.
translation.zh: 嗯 我很开心

translation.en: I know who you are.
translation.zh: 我知道你是谁

translation.en: - I know who that is, Irving. - Yeah. Come on.
translation.zh:
-欧文 我知道她是谁
-好了 过来

translation.en: - Oh, it looks so beautiful. - So, this is the lobby.
translation.zh:
-喔 这里美极了
-这就是大厅了

translation.en: Want me to take your coats?
translation.zh: 需要我帮您拿大衣吗？

translation.en: Now, mind you, a week ago, this place was a mess.
translation.zh: 记得吗 一周前这里还是一团糟

translation.en: But what existed was this plasterwork.
translation.zh: 但他们保留了这些抹灰的痕迹

translation.en: Look at the detail. This is beautiful.
translation.zh: 你仔细看看 这些太漂亮了

translation.en: My sons are craftsmen. Please, tell them what you did.
translation.zh:
我有几个儿子是工匠
请一定告诉他们你们做了什么

translation.en: - The birds, sky, clouds, wood... - Trompe I'oeil.
translation.zh:
-看看这些鸟 天空 云 还有树
-障眼法

translation.en: - Trompe I'oeil. - "Trick of the eye."
translation.zh:
-障眼法
-“视觉的错觉”

translation.en: We restore all of this, you see?
translation.zh: 我们修复了全部的这些

translation.en: Saved you $50 million. Look at me. $50 million...
translation.zh: 帮你省了五千万 看着我 五千万

translation.en: - ...right off the bat, like that. - Right off the bat.
translation.zh:
-从一开始
-一开始

translation.en: I waive the law that I helped write...
translation.zh: 我不在乎当时我帮忙签订的法律

translation.en: ...that said casino construction had to be built...
translation.zh: 是否说过赌场必须得

translation.en: ...ground-up new. We don't do new.
translation.zh: 重新建造 我们不会新建

translation.en: - No. We renovate. - We renovate, right?
translation.zh:
-我们只是改装
-改装

translation.en: We put in some temporary fun.
translation.zh: 我们设置了一个临时赌场

translation.en: Some gaming tables, some play money for people to have a good time.
translation.zh:
摆了一些赌桌
还有一些筹码好让客人尽兴

translation.en: This is for charity, for the Boys and Girls Club...
translation.zh: 这是给慈善机构 和孤儿院的

translation.en: ...and, uh, some arts programs. Hey, how are you?
translation.zh: 还有其他的一些艺术项目

translation.en: This is the Ocean Room.
translation.zh: 这间是海洋屋

translation.en: There's some gentlemen sitting over there at the bar.
translation.zh: 那些绅士们正坐在酒吧旁

translation.en: That's 130 years sitting right there.
translation.zh: 坐在那的是整整一百三十年

translation.en: That's how much time between them.
translation.zh: 他们的工作资历

translation.en: They run the biggest casinos in the United States...
translation.zh: 他们经营过美国最大的赌场

translation.en: - ...and we have to work with them. - Right.
translation.zh:
-我们将会和他们合作
-对

translation.en: The good news is...
translation.zh: 好消息是

translation.en: ...they know how it's done, they get it done...
translation.zh: 他们懂得并且成功经营过赌场

translation.en: ...you don't have to worry, everyone makes their money.
translation.zh: 我们根本不用担心 大家都有钱赚

translation.en: You mean the Mob?
translation.zh: 你是说黑道？

translation.en: Yes, but they're businessmen, ok?
translation.zh: 他们也是生意人 好吗？

translation.en: Now, spend as much or as little time with them...
translation.zh: 想不想和他们接触随便你

translation.en: ...as you like, but we do have to deal with them.
translation.zh: 但是我们必须要应付他们

translation.en: All we got to do is go say hello.
translation.zh: 我们要做的只是去打个招呼

translation.en: - We just got to say hi. That's it. - Carmine, maybe...
translation.zh:
-打个招呼就好
-卡麦 也许

translation.en: I'm not sure that's such a good idea.
translation.zh: 我不确定这是不是个好主意

translation.en: We got to confer before we talk to these guys.
translation.zh: 在我们接触这些人之前得先聊聊

translation.en: Confer? What is there to confer about? I don't understand.
translation.zh: 聊聊？聊什么？我不懂

translation.en: They're casino guys.
translation.zh: 他们可是赌场人

translation.en: They're casino guys. They're the businessmen.
translation.zh: 他们懂赌场 他们会做生意

translation.en: Yeah, we come all this way.
translation.zh: 都到这一步了

translation.en: Irving, we came all this way, we should be here.
translation.zh: 欧文 我们都走到这一步了

translation.en: What's everybody scared of? What's everybody scared of?
translation.zh: 你们都在害怕什么？

translation.en: You just got to be delicate.
translation.zh: 只是要小心一点

translation.en: Those are the guys that you guys are all scared of?
translation.zh: 你们就是在害怕这些家伙？

translation.en: Those guys over there? They don't scare me.
translation.zh:
坐那儿的那些家伙？
他们可吓唬不了我

translation.en: - I'm not scared. - Rosalyn? Rosalyn?
translation.zh:
-我不怕的
-罗丝琳？

translation.en: Hi. Can I join you?
translation.zh: 你们好 我可以加入你们吗？

translation.en: Irv, that's not the way to do this.
translation.zh: 欧文 这可不太好吧

translation.en: It's not a good idea.
translation.zh: 这主意糟透了

translation.en: I love this.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: Everybody over there's really scared of you guys, do you know that?
translation.zh:
那边的几个人都很怕你们
你们知道吗？

translation.en: - No. - Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
-不知道
-嗯

translation.en: Kids, I want you to go up and get some soda and pizza, please.
translation.zh: 孩子们 帮我拿点披萨和饮料好吗？

translation.en: It's a disaster.
translation.zh: 这简直是场灾难

translation.en: I think they got this room all wrong.
translation.zh: 我觉得这间屋子的装潢全错了

translation.en: Yeah? What would you do?
translation.zh: 哦？那你会怎么做？

translation.en: I would do it in all black and gold...
translation.zh: 我会想要全部黑色镶金

translation.en: ...and I would do this bar like a big warm golden mirror.
translation.zh:
吧台这里我会做成一面
大的暖金色镜子

translation.en: Sounds beautiful.
translation.zh: 听起来会很美

translation.en: - Oh, thank you. - But you expect that from her...
translation.zh:
-谢谢
-她这么漂亮

translation.en: - ...because she's so beautiful. - Oh, God, stop.
translation.zh:
-你才会这么说吧
-天哪 别说了

translation.en: - Gorgeous. - And I love her hair...
translation.zh:
-完美
-我喜欢你的头发

translation.en: ...so I know I'm gonna love what you do.
translation.zh: 你做什么我都爱

translation.en: - Oh, my God. It's messy. - How do you do?
translation.zh:
-得了吧
-你说呢？

translation.en: I'm sorry, is she your wife?
translation.zh: 抱歉 这是你妻子？

translation.en: No, she's my wife. She's my wife.
translation.zh: 不 她是我妻子

translation.en: - Look at these fine gentlemen. - Hey, Carmine, there you are.
translation.zh:
-瞧瞧这些绅士们
-卡麦 你来了

translation.en: - How you doing? - How are you?
translation.zh:
-过得好吗？
-你呢？

translation.en: You well? Good to see you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: - How you doing? - Hey, how are you?
translation.zh:
-还好吗？
-不错

translation.en: That's enough of that right now.
translation.zh: 别喝了

translation.en: Hey! Hey! Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: - Come on. Come on. - Oh, stop it.
translation.zh:
-拜托
-行了 够了

translation.en: Hey, oh, no, it's because he's a party pooper.
translation.zh: 别管他 他就是个扫兴鬼

translation.en: He's so boring.
translation.zh: 超级无趣

translation.en: May I present...
translation.zh: 向各位介绍

translation.en: Sheik Abdullah, gentlemen...
translation.zh: 先生们 阿杜拉酋长

translation.en: ...from Abu Dhabi. Sheik, these are professionals...
translation.zh:
来自阿布达比
酋长 这些都是专业人士

translation.en: ...and they run the best casinos in the United States.
translation.zh: 他们经营着全美国最好的赌场

translation.en: Mr. Sheik, as a sign of our seriousness...
translation.zh: 酋长先生 为表诚意

translation.en: ...Mr. Tellegio came from Miami to meet you tonight.
translation.zh: 特里乔先生特地从迈阿密赶来见你

translation.en: Mr. Tellegio?
translation.zh: 特里乔先生？

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me Mr. Tellegio was...
translation.zh: 你怎么没告诉我他会来？

translation.en: He's in the back room.
translation.zh: 他就在里面的房间里

translation.en: It's a sign of disrespect to talk, uh, business on the first meeting.
translation.zh:
第一次见面就谈生意
可是对酋长的不敬

translation.en: - That's not true. - It's disrespectful...
translation.zh:
-才怪
-这有点不尊重

translation.en: Yeah, I don't know what you're talking about...
translation.zh: 我不知道你在讲什么

translation.en: - He's got it all wrong. - You want to leave him back there in...
translation.zh:
-他说得不对
-你是想把他晾在里面

translation.en: ...the back room waiting? Come on, let's go...
translation.zh: 一个人等着吗？行了 快来吧

translation.en: - ...we got to go meet him. - My friend from New York...
translation.zh:
-我们必须得见他
-他来自纽约

translation.en: - ...doesn't know the customs-- ...Hey, no disrespect, pal.
translation.zh:
-不知道这些习俗
-我们不是故意不敬的

translation.en: Hey, Irving, I'm gonna be having fun.
translation.zh: 欧文 我会玩得很开心的

translation.en: Maybe it'll be contagious, huh?
translation.zh: 希望这能传染给你

translation.en: You and me, we're gonna visit.
translation.zh: 你和我 我们一起去看看

translation.en: - She's a fun girl. - I'm having fun.
translation.zh:
-她可真有意思
-我很开心

translation.en: Can you believe he talks to me that way?
translation.zh: 你能相信他这么和我说话吗？

translation.en: Carmine.
translation.zh: 卡麦

translation.en: Victor Tellegio was from Miami.
translation.zh: 维克托特里乔 来自迈阿密

translation.en: He was Meyer Lansky's right-hand man.
translation.zh: 他是麦尔兰斯基的左右手

translation.en: With his prior reputation as an enforcer from 20 years ago...
translation.zh: 20年前当杀手的时候

translation.en: ...he was known to never bury a body, because he felt it sent...
translation.zh: 就因为从不掩埋尸体而闻名

translation.en: ...a stronger message to leave it in the street.
translation.zh: 因为他觉得陈尸街头会更记忆深刻

translation.en: He looked at me like...
translation.zh: 他看着我就像…

translation.en: This is the guy we now had to deal with.
translation.zh: 这个家伙就是我们现在要对付的了

translation.en: You sure you don't want to go into the Ocean Bar?
translation.zh: 你真的不去海洋酒吧看看吗？

translation.en: It's really, it's beautiful in there.
translation.zh: 里面真的很美

translation.en: No, I don't have to go there. I like it here. There's an exit.
translation.zh: 不必了 出口就在这 我很喜欢

translation.en: I'm like a ghost.
translation.zh: 我就像幽灵一样

translation.en: Nobody knows I'm here.
translation.zh: 没人知道我在这

translation.en: Look, tell him I speak for our friends in Florida.
translation.zh:
告诉他我能代表
我来自弗罗里达的朋友们

translation.en: We're very excited. It's been our lifelong dream...
translation.zh:
我们都非常激动
这是我们一生的梦想

translation.en: ...to build casino resorts on the East Coast.
translation.zh: 能在东海岸建成一座赌场度假村

translation.en: You told him that?
translation.zh: 你和他说了这个？

translation.en: They didn't want the Jews to make money.
translation.zh: 他们不想让犹太人挣到钱

translation.en: They didn't want the Italians to make money.
translation.zh: 他们不想让意大利人挣到钱

translation.en: They definitely don't want the blacks to make money.
translation.zh: 他们更不会想让黑人挣到钱

translation.en: After the oil embargo, gasoline crisis...
translation.zh: 经历了石油禁运 汽油危机

translation.en: ...the hijackings, the Olympics...
translation.zh: 劫机事件以及奥运会之后

translation.en: ...they don't want to see Arabs make money...
translation.zh:
他们现在不愿意看见
阿拉伯人挣到钱了

translation.en: ...trust me, not on our soil.
translation.zh: 在这片地上 你挣不到钱

translation.en: And, I don't know, you can tell him this in your own way.
translation.zh: 你可以用你自己的话转告他

translation.en: I've been in the casino business 40 years'...
translation.zh: 我做赌场生意40年了

translation.en: Where are your heart pills?
translation.zh: 你的心脏药呢？

translation.en: - Where are your heart pills? - In the pocket. Inside.
translation.zh:
-你的心脏药在哪里？
-口袋里 里面的

translation.en: Here. There you go.
translation.zh: 拿着 快吃

translation.en: Are you all right?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Ok. Come with me. Come on.
translation.zh: 来 我扶着你

translation.en: - Come with me. - Come on.
translation.zh:
-我扶着你
-来

translation.en: Come on, just walk.
translation.zh: 慢点走

translation.en: - Come on. - You ok?
translation.zh:
-慢点
-你还好吗？

translation.en: I got to lay down.
translation.zh: 我得躺会

translation.en: Ok?
translation.zh: 行吗？

translation.en: Just rest.
translation.zh: 就休息一下

translation.en: - You ready? - Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你准备好了吗？
-嗯

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: Please. Come in, sit down.
translation.zh: 请进 请坐

translation.en: You know where our $2 million is?
translation.zh: 你们知道我们的两百万去哪里了吗？

translation.en: - Two million? - Yeah.
translation.zh:
-两百万？
-对

translation.en: It's with, uh, Victor Tellegio and Alfonse Simone.
translation.zh:
不是在维克托特里乔
和阿方斯希蒙手上吗？

translation.en: No, actually, it's not with Victor Tellegio or Alfonse Simone.
translation.zh:
不 他们其实并没有在维克多特里乔
和阿方斯希蒙手上

translation.en: He fucking knows about it.
translation.zh: 他绝对知道钱在哪里

translation.en: Its gone missing.
translation.zh: 那笔钱不见了

translation.en: Did you know that?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: - No, I knew nothing about that - Where's it gone?
translation.zh: 不 我不知道 它怎么不见了？

translation.en: Well, that's interesting that you say that, because...
translation.zh: 你这么说倒是很有意思

translation.en: ...while you were on your way over here...
translation.zh: 因为在你们来的路上

translation.en: ...we got an anonymous phone call from someone...
translation.zh: 我们收到了一通匿名电话

translation.en: ...who said that, in exchange for immunity for the two of you...
translation.zh: 说如果我们能为你们免罪并且

translation.en: ...and a reduced sentence for Carmine Polito...
translation.zh: 帮助卡麦波利特减刑的话

translation.en: ...we get our $2 million back.
translation.zh: 那两百万就会归还给我们

translation.en: That's interesting. That's very interesting.
translation.zh: 有意思

translation.en: - I have no idea. - No idea?
translation.zh:
-我完全不知道
-不知道？

translation.en: No idea what you're talking about.
translation.zh:
-不知道什么？
-你到底在讲什么

translation.en: I get it.
translation.zh: 我懂了

translation.en: I understand how these deals are made, right?
translation.zh: 我清楚你是怎么做成这些交易的

translation.en: See, someone has leverage.
translation.zh: 有些人有筹码

translation.en: Anthony, fuck them. Fuck them. It's over.
translation.zh: 安东尼 别和他们胡扯了 都完了

translation.en: - I don't think so. - We got them for wire fraud.
translation.zh:
-不
-他们电汇诈骗

translation.en: It's over. You're done.
translation.zh: 都结束了 你们完了

translation.en: - You're both done. You're done. - No, I don't think so.
translation.zh:
-你们俩都完了
-我不同意

translation.en: - I don't think so. - Oh, you don't think so?
translation.zh:
-不
-你不同意？

translation.en: Richard, you requested the two million.
translation.zh: 理查德 是你提出了两百万的要求

translation.en: And you gave Brenda the account number.
translation.zh: 你给了布兰达电汇的号码

translation.en: - No, no. - We didn't do any of that.
translation.zh:
-不
-我们可什么都没做

translation.en: None of it.
translation.zh: 一点没碰

translation.en: How do we know that you don't have the money?
translation.zh: 我们怎么知道钱不是在你手上？

translation.en: Am I living in a fucking nightmare right now?
translation.zh: 我现在是在做噩梦吗？

translation.en: I find this a little offensive. Really, I find this a little offensive...
translation.zh: 我觉得你们这样很伤人

translation.en: ...and I don't see that you got any sort of-- Don't let him get in your head.
translation.zh:
-而且你好像也没有…
-别被他们骗了

translation.en: Listen to me. Listen to me. Listen to me.
translation.zh: 听我说

translation.en: We're dealing with a very clever individual.
translation.zh: 这些家伙可是老油条

translation.en: - Don't let him... - Richard. Richard.
translation.zh:
-别让他…
-理查德

translation.en: Think about it, all right?
translation.zh: 好好想想 好吗？

translation.en: You got some big arrests.
translation.zh: 你们已经逮到了一些大人物

translation.en: You got U.S. congressmen. You look good.
translation.zh: 你逮到了国会议员 这可是很风光的

translation.en: You're going to be all over the news.
translation.zh: 你会登上各路新闻

translation.en: You know what doesn't look good?
translation.zh: 那你知道有哪些不风光的吗？

translation.en: A story about gross incompetence.
translation.zh: 是关于办案不利的报道

translation.en: I have a warrant for--
translation.zh: 我有搜查令…

translation.en: Sorry, do I have the wrong office?
translation.zh: 抱歉 我好像走错办公室了

translation.en: This 701? Alfonse Simone?
translation.zh: 这里是 701？ 阿方斯希蒙？

translation.en: This is 701.
translation.zh: 这里是701

translation.en: My name is Roger Thigpen. I've had this office for 25 years.
translation.zh:
我的名字是罗杰西格彭
我在这里工作25年了

translation.en: I'm a divorce attorney.
translation.zh: 我是一名离婚律师

translation.en: You lost $2 million of taxpayer money...
translation.zh: 你们丢掉了纳税人的两百万

translation.en: ...because you were confused about the location...
translation.zh: 因为你搞错了维克托特里乔律师的

translation.en: ...and the identity of Victor Tellegio's attorney?
translation.zh: 办公室以及他的身份？

translation.en: The role of Tellegio's attorney...
translation.zh: 特里乔的律师阿方斯希蒙是由

translation.en: ...Alfonse Simone, was played by our friend, Ed Malone...
translation.zh: 我们的朋友艾德马龙扮演的

translation.en: ...the Cold Cut King of Long Island...
translation.zh: 人称他长岛火腿王

translation.en: ...whose party we were at when Sydney and I first met.
translation.zh:
我和希妮的第一次见面
就是在他的派对上

translation.en: Alfonse Simone.
translation.zh: 阿方斯希蒙

translation.en: People believe what they want to believe, Richie.
translation.zh: 里奇 人们只相信他们愿意相信的

translation.en: No, because you conned me. That's why, because you both fucking con...
translation.zh:
你们骗了我
因为你们都是他妈的大骗子

translation.en: You got under me. You did. You know, that, uh...
translation.zh:
-你们设计了我
-你知道的

translation.en: That doesn't sound so good, either, right there.
translation.zh: 这听上去也不太好

translation.en: You know, I mean, and I don't know what you're talking about...
translation.zh: 我其实根本不知道你在说些什么

translation.en: ...but let's just assume you want to go with that story.
translation.zh: 但我们假设你想要这个故事这么发展

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 你认真的？

translation.en: That's the story you want to go with?
translation.zh: 你想要这个故事这么发展吗？

translation.en: All right?
translation.zh: 嗯？

translation.en: That's what you want the New York Times to hear?
translation.zh: 你想让纽约时报这么报道？

translation.en: That you got conned by the very con men...
translation.zh: 你被几个被你逼着设计国会议员的

translation.en: ...who you forced to entrap the members of Congress in the first place?
translation.zh: 诈骗犯给骗了？

translation.en: That's what you want to go with?
translation.zh: 这是你想听到的故事？

translation.en: That doesn't sound so good for your whole thing, does it?
translation.zh: 对你而言这听起来并不美好啊

translation.en: And how ironic that the ones who were working hardest...
translation.zh: 更讽刺的是 那些最努力想要帮助

translation.en: ...to get the economy of New Jersey going...
translation.zh: 新泽西州经济发展的人

translation.en: ...those are the ones that you round up.
translation.zh: 最后因为你身陷囹圄

translation.en: And why? Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Because, what, they're the easiest to go after?
translation.zh: 就因为他们是最好上钩的？

translation.en: And what about the real bullshit artists?
translation.zh: 那那些真正的满口扯淡的大师们呢？

translation.en: You didn't even come close to the big leagues.
translation.zh: 你连他们那个巨大联盟的边都没够着

translation.en: Those big guys, the money men.
translation.zh: 那些大家伙 那些有钱人

translation.en: That's what I was trying to go after.
translation.zh: 他们才是我本来的目标

translation.en: I'm sorry to tell you, you got none of them.
translation.zh:
很抱歉的告诉你
这些人你一个也没抓住

translation.en: You know, Richie, I think, uh...
translation.zh: 里奇

translation.en: We may call you as a witness, but otherwise you're done.
translation.zh:
稍后可能需要你当证人
不然你可以走了

translation.en: I think you better go home.
translation.zh: 你该回家了

translation.en: - Stoddard... - Go on home, Richard.
translation.zh:
-史多达…
-回家吧 理查德

translation.en: We took down some very big guys.
translation.zh: 我们扳倒了几个很大的人物

translation.en: Some of whom, they were just doing business as usual...
translation.zh: 他们中的一部分只是在像往常一样

translation.en: ...helping their communities or their states...
translation.zh: 帮助着他们州各个社区的建设

translation.en: ...but some of them knew they had larceny in their blood.
translation.zh: 但有些人 他们清楚

translation.en: And they even admitted it.
translation.zh: 并承认了自己的贪污

translation.en: But in all, it was six congressmen, one United States senator...
translation.zh:
无论如何 我们抓住了六个国会议员
一位参议员

translation.en: ...and my friend, Carmine Polito.
translation.zh: 以及我的朋友 卡麦波利特

translation.en: We gave the two million back...
translation.zh: 我们归还了两百万

translation.en: ...so Carmine got the reduced sentence, 18 months.
translation.zh:
所以卡麦获得了减刑
减到了18个月

translation.en: The loss of his friendship...
translation.zh: 但失去了他的友谊

translation.en: ...would haunt me for the rest of my life.
translation.zh: 将会是我的一生之殇

translation.en: And when the story was written...
translation.zh: 而当这个故事被大众所知时

translation.en: ...Richard DiMaso's name was never mentioned.
translation.zh:
理查德狄马索的名字
根本没有被提起过

translation.en: Syd and I, we moved in together.
translation.zh: 我和希妮同居了

translation.en: Rosalyn...
translation.zh: 至于罗丝琳

translation.en: The car is a little dinged up, I'm a little stiff...
translation.zh:
我的车撞凹了一小块
我有点被吓到了

translation.en: ...but whatever, I don't want to talk about it.
translation.zh: 不说了 我不想再说这件事了

translation.en: She would always be interesting.
translation.zh: 她永远都是这么有意思

translation.en: You know, my boss knows you did him a solid.
translation.zh: 我老板知道你帮了他一个大忙

translation.en: Yes, I did.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: He never took a nickel, so they can't get him for nothing.
translation.zh: 他一分没拿 所以他们也没辙

translation.en: I was never going to let that happen.
translation.zh: 我也不会让那种事情发生的

translation.en: - All right. - Irv.
translation.zh:
-好吧
-欧文

translation.en: I'm done with that nail finish.
translation.zh: 这款护甲油我用腻了

translation.en: Bye for now. I'll see you next weekend.
translation.zh: 我们先走了 下周末再见

translation.en: Hey. Look at you.
translation.zh: 嘿 看看你

translation.en: I think your mom got your nose. Is it ok that I wipe that?
translation.zh:
你妈妈是不是把你鼻子弄脏了
我可以帮你擦擦吗？

translation.en: Our conning days were behind us.
translation.zh: 我们的诈骗人生到此结束

translation.en: You can fool yourself for just so long...
translation.zh: 你可以一直欺骗着你自己

translation.en: ...and then your next reinvention...
translation.zh: 但是一切过后

translation.en: ...better have your damn feet on the ground.
translation.zh: 你最好还是脚踏实地

translation.en: This one is abstract expressionism. I love it 'cause these ones...
translation.zh:
这是抽象表现主义
我喜欢这幅是因为他们…

translation.en: We got a loan from a bank and were able to go gallery-legitimate.
translation.zh:
我们从银行贷到了款项
之后开了一个合法的画廊

translation.en: The art of survival is a story that never ends.
translation.zh: 生存的艺术却是一个永无止境的故事
